content: + pithaavum, puthranum parishuddha roohaayumaaya sathyekadaivatthinte thirunaamatthil thanikku sthuthi.
Aakaashavum bhoomiyum thante sthuthikallaal niranyirikkunna balavaanaaya daivamthampuraan parishuddhan parishuddhan parishuddhan. + uyarangallil sthuthi.
Daivamaaya kartthaavinte thirunaamatthil vannavanum varunnavanumaayavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. Uyarangallil sthuthi. +

Nyangallude kartthaave! / Nyangallodu karunacheyyaname / nyangallude kartthaave! / Kyapayundaayi nyangallodu karunacheyyaname / nyangallude kartthaave, / nyangallude shushrooshayum praarththhanakallum kaikkondu / nyangallodu karunacheyyaname.
Daivame! Ninakku sthuthi / srashdaave! Ninakku sthuthi / paapikallaaya ninte adiyaarodu / karunacheyyunna mishihaa raajaave / ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

Svargasthhanaaya nyangallude pithaave! / Ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappedaname. / Ninte raajyam varaname. / Thiruvishdam svargatthileppole bhoomiyilum aakaname. / Nyangallkku aavashyamaaya appam innu nyangallkku tharaname. / Nyangallude kadakkaarodu nyangall kshamichathupole / nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum nyangallodu kshamikkaname. / Pareekshayilekku nyangalle praveshippikkaruthe. / Pinneyo dushdanilninnu nyangalle rakshichukollllaname. / Entennaal raajyavum / shakthiyum/ mahathvavum / enneykkum ninakkullllathaakunnu. Aammeen.

Krpa niranya mariyame! Ninakku samaadhaanam / nyangallude kartthaavu ninnodukoode, / nee sthreekallil vaazhtthappettavallaakunnu. / Ninte udaraphalamaaya / nyangallude kartthaaveshumishihaa vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. / Daivamaathaavaaya vishuddha kanyakamartthamariyame! / Thampuraante amme / paapikallaaya nyangallkku vendi ippozhum eppozhum / nyangallude maranasamayatthum / Daivam thampuraanodu apekshichukollllaname. Aammeen.
